messages.text: "we called Koin. They are recording"
"I think you should let people know. "
"Also participating as business downtown "
"we called Koin. They are recording"
"I did right up front. "
"Do you want me to let people know. I can call them myself and ask them not to use the recording since they didn't respond to your question"
"Let people know. Don't care if they use the video. "
"I can speak to budget on any items "
"Jump in anytime "
"Hi Kristin, it's Rachel Solotaroff from CCC. Just confirmed we can expand nav team capacity if desired. I don't see a chat option on the Zoom call; apologies for texting. "
"Hi Kristin, it's Rachel Solotaroff from CCC. Just confirmed we can expand nav team capacity if desired. I don't see a chat option on the Zoom call; apologies for texting. "

"For when you close this meeting:   Direct me to establish a regular meeting to coordinate on this effort across Mayor’s office, OMF/PHB/JOHS/Parks/PBOT/PPR/Prosper as well as supplemental meetings with PBA, Travel Portland, OTCT, etc for us to share info and get feedback "
"Whaaaat? We aren't going to investigate a $1mm theft?? UNACCEPTABLE. "
"Please follow up and get back to me on that. "
"Absolutely "
"Call me"
"Is that you trying to call? Leading a meeting but will jump out!"
"Yes"
"Call pls"
"Weekly follow up is key. I am on it with your team. Shoshanah, from my team, will be project manager."

"I'm glad to hear that. She's great. Thank you for doing that this morning. It gives people confidence that we understand the urgency, and that we're planning strategically to address these problems."

"I'm glad to hear that. She's great. Thank you for doing that this morning. It gives people confidence that we understand the urgency, and that we're planning strategically to address these problems."

"Forgot to mention that when you direct Parks to do daily clean ups, you should also direct them to open and clean bathrooms in areas where the ECC is paying for 'hygiene stations.' We could deploy these elsewhere if Parks would just open and clean bathrooms.  "
"Thank you"
"The program tonight starts at 6. 5pm is the Pre-show so no rush "

"Draft Tweet for today:       Honored to join Pastor Mondaine and community members at the March on Portland on the 57th Anniversary of the March on Washington.  Today and everyday we must acknowledge that horrific acts of police violence, the grief and trauma felt by the Black community, and the countless systematic institutional disadvantages that have shaped anti-Black sentiments are part of our reality. I ask to stand locked arm in arm with you. Holding myself accountable, denouncing hate and joining in leadership working towards better Portland for all."

"Draft Tweet for today:       Honored to join Pastor Mondaine and community members at the March on Portland on the 57th Anniversary of the March on Washington.  Today and everyday we must acknowledge that horrific acts of police violence, the grief and trauma felt by the Black community, and the countless systematic institutional disadvantages that have shaped anti-Black sentiments are part of our reality. I ask to stand locked arm in arm with you. Holding myself accountable, denouncing hate and joining in leadership working towards better Portland for all."
"Horrific acts of violence, including police violence. "
"You cut out "
"Sorry I missed your call. All good? "

"Ted...Sharing a tweet for review  before sending out.      Grateful to the many business owners, @PDX_BizAlliance and others who took the time to meet with me today. I heard first-hand the challenges employers are facing and we’re working urgently together to implement business revitalization and improving the health of our downtown.      (link to press release)"

"Edited to change 'improving ' to improve.      Ted...Sharing a tweet for review  before sending out.      Grateful to the many business owners, @PDX_BizAlliance and others who took the time to meet with me today. I heard first-hand the challenges employers are facing and we’re working urgently together to implement business revitalization and to improve the health of our downtown.      (link to press release)"
"Friendly reminder: we are meeting with Jim Middaugh at 5 via zoom.       (communications director candidate)"

"Hi Mayor- just an FYI ¡Prospera! Is tonight (Virginia Garcia Memorial Gala) it is on your calendar at 5- the link is in the appointment. Serena Cruz is going to announce that you are on when she does the introduction.      You have no formal   role- not speaking "
"Got it. Thx. "
"Mayor- do you have an ETA on arrival? "

"TPs:          • Thank you, Pastor Mondaine for inviting me to say a few words.       • Before I even begin, I must acknowledge the tragic acts of police violence upon Jacob Blake, the lost lives due to acts of police violence of BRE-ONNA TAYLOR, GEORGE FLOYD and many others, the grief and trauma felt by the Black community, and the countless systemic institutional disadvantages that have shaped anti-Black sentiments.           • I also want to recognize today marks the 57th anniversary of the March on Washington, and I stand in solidarity with those who are in Washington DC today.       • I also know that my appearance here is a bit of a contrast, because not only am I your mayor, but I’m also the Police Commissioner.           • Which is why I must be here.       • To stand with you all, to listen and be accountable.           • To commit that not only will the City of Portland continue to reallocate dollars and invest in the Black community, but we will push other levels of government to do the same.       • To acknowledge that while all violence is not welcome in Portland, government sponsored violence is the most insidious.   • To push the entire criminal justice system with the fervor necessary to help all of our community feel safe and equally protected.       • I want to stand locked arm and arm with you. Holding myself accountable, joining in demonstration, denouncing hate, denouncing all violence and destruction, and wanting to join in leadership on our path forward.       • So as we march together, know that I and my administration are committed to this work, committed to recognizing the wrongs and making the changes NOW to move forward, and reaffirming BLACK LIVES MATTER."
"Please reschedule the interview with Jim for late tomorrow afternoon. I'd like to speak with him."
"Ok"
"Will do"
"Is Andrew handling all the business side invites? Can I add Helen Ying? Or is that another meeting?"
"Add anyone. "
"If anybody needs to reach me text me on my work phone. If anybody needs to call me and talk to me in person they have to use my personal cell."
"Understood. "
"Text seems to work great calls not so much. "
"Copy "
"Please make sure Greg Goodman gets the invite. He's expecting it. "

"I still don't have the link.       Aja effective immediately I am no longer going to read or respond to my emails. I'm counting on you to read them and notate with URGENT those that need my direct attention or provide important information that I need to see, forward to CS those that need a response. Otherwise I will ignore them. "
"This included ted.wheeler. "

"Liked “I still don't have the link.       Aja effective immediately I am no longer going to read or respond to my emails. I'm counting on you to read them and notate with URGENT those that need my direct attention or provide important information that I need to see, forward to CS those that need a response. Otherwise I will ignore them. ”"
"Liked “Please make sure Greg Goodman gets the invite. He's expecting it. ”"
"To be clear I still wa t to see meaningful constituent emails, even disagreeable ones. I don't need to see the obvious hate screeds. "
"Understood. "
"Please invite homer. "
"Sent"
"Thank you both for helping to get this mornings meeting off the ground. I think it went well. Thanks for all your efforts. I'm gonna be leading on you guys pretty hard in the weeks ahead."
"Leaning"
"Thanks for   Your leadership Mayor. Happy to do whatever it takes! "
"After we take feedback from Carmen's presentation, I will give an overview of homeless part of plan "
"Ok. Good. "

"Mayor, any updates on the things we discussed? You had said you would try to gather munitions info for us. You also said you would look into the violent assault and violations of directives by officer 37.  Know it may take time but I'd love to be kept informed. "

"Mayor Wheeler, I don't represent the groups but I've been asked to relay a message to you from the folks in your buildings lobby. They want to meet. Mac Smiff is there and is available to talk with you.       "

"Trump supporters are hitting people with cars and PPB is doing nothing. They, in fact are harassing Mac and others and filming in violation of law.      https://twitter.com/MacSmiff/status/1299903966659055617?s=19"
"https://twitter.com/MacSmiff/status/1299902631599460352?s=09"
"Tonight is gonna get violent. "
"Already is "
"TRUMP folks assault people: hit with cars, shoot pepper balls, fight, damage property and this is PPB:       https://twitter.com/alankesslr/status/1299904657590902787?s=19"

"I'll need Kimberly on the 9:30 zoom call with business leaders to discuss recovery plan for downtown. My goal for the call is to have a framework for how we are going to assist businesses in the recovery from the nightly violence. I am hoping it will include some resources to help businesses abate the graffiti and damage, perhaps even recover some uninsured damage costs. I believe there are three separate communication opportunities here: 1) direct support and assistance for business recovery and a plan to encourage people to come downtown; 2) livability enhancements including trash collection, graffiti abatement; 3) enhanced efforts to address chronic homelessness and tent camping/more shelter or organized camping. "

"Good morning Mayor and team. Glad to join the call. We met with PBA and Travel Portland leadership earlier this week and they expressed enthusiasm for the event/activation and storytelling approach we shared. We dispersed available TIF resources to support biz repair downtown already so I can make sure everyone is aware of the opportunity to apply for the CARES funding. Also, PBA and Travel Portland asked that the City prioritize investments to repair Parks and ROW (eg tipping light poles, graffiti in Director's park.) Perhaps PBOT and/or Parks can fast-track their repair work?"
"Thanks Kimberly. Will make sure you get the invite. "
"Liked “Thanks Kimberly. Will make sure you get the invite. ”"
"I believe the only uncertainties around homeless and trash pick up plans that Marc, Shannon and I proposed are funding and staffing. "
"I can speak to funding "
"Liked “I can speak to funding ”"
"Cathy is working on staffing "
"I'll direct parks to do the clean up. It's a mess. "
"Liked “I'll direct parks to do the clean up. It's a mess. ”"
"Mayor- Kristin asked me to send you your link for the reimagine Oregon meeting to both your phones: the meeting is today 11-1      "

"Mayor sounds like Tanner so peaceful protesters are in the lobby of your building. I've talk to the HOA president and just spoke with Commander Dobson they're monitoring just want to make sure you were aware. There are a couple hundred folks in the park blocks so they're not taking immediate action at your building because folks are peaceful"

"Bill said he went outside couple other folks in the street blocking traffic but very very peaceful no agitators in the group and there's some restaurant nearby that has outside dining and they are all continuing to eat and drink so that's bills report at this point"
"A couple hundred folks in the street"
"Mayor of Commander Dobson just called and told me they have left the lobby. Well done PPB"
"Group appears to be diminishing in numbers. concert appears over and they are packing up."
"That's good news thank you Craig "
